# NOTE: This file is generated by yotta: changes will be overwritten!

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

include_directories("C:/Microbit/MicroBitV1Template/yotta_modules/microbit/source")


set(YOTTA_AUTO_MICROBIT_CPP_FILES
    "C:/Microbit/MicroBitV1Template/yotta_modules/microbit/source/MicroBit.cpp"
)
# force dependency on the config header for cpp files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_MICROBIT_CPP_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "C:/Microbit/MicroBitV1Template/build/bbc-microbit-classic-gcc/yotta_config.h")


add_library(microbit
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_MICROBIT_CPP_FILES}
)

yotta_postprocess_target(LIBRARY microbit)



target_link_libraries(microbit
    microbit-dal
)
